title: Walter White (boxer)
text:
Walter White (19 February 1904 – 1984) was a British <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201924%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1924%20Summer%20Olympics">1924 Summer Olympics</a>.
White won the 1924 <a href="England%20Boxing">Amateur Boxing Association</a> British <a href="England%20Boxing%20National%20Amateur%20Championships%20Lightweight%20Champions">lightweight title</a>, when boxing out of the United Scottish BC.
